input:

Options: 
A. January 2008
B. January 2009
C. January 2010
D. January 2011 

Answer:

Options: 
A. 1
B. 2
C. 3
D. 4 

Answer:

Options:

B. Classroom

D. District 

Answer:

B. 4 weeks

Answer:

Options:

D. 900 

Answer:

Options: 
A. 32%
B. 50%

Options:

B. 12.5 years

Answer:

Options:

Answer:
